name: v0.20.4
body: - added the ViewPropsType

name: v0.21.0
body:
0.21.0 (June 14, 2022)
[Update]: Add DTX Option for Publisher
[Update]: Android Native SDK to 2.22.3 and iOS to 2.22.3

name: v0.20.3
body: - [Fix]: Updates from DependatBot

[Update]: Readme file update with Bintray instructions
[Update]: Android Native SDK to 2.21.5 and iOS to 2.21.3
[Fix]: Typescrit types fixed audioLevel

[Update]: Add Content Hint API on the OTPublisher object
[Update]: Add timestamp property on the audioNetworkStats and videoNetworkStats
[Fix]: Bump opentok-react-native version to

[Update]: update SDKs Android to 2.21.4
[Update]: update SDKs iOS to 2.21.3

name: v0.19.0
body:
- [Update]: update SDKs Android to 2.20.2
- [Update]: added IceConfig options in the Session Options object
- [Fix]: added missing typings in @types/index.d.ts
- [Fix]: fix crash in OTSubscriberLayout [#525](https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/pull/525)

name: Release v0.18.0
body:
[Update]: update SDKs iOS to 2.20.0 and Android to 2.20.1
[Fix]: fix crash in OTPublisherLayout when sessionId is null. Fix: https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/462#issuecomment-752171962
[Fix]: Downgrade uuidv4 module to 3.4.0 due to UUID#375
[Fix]: OTCustomAudioDrive added file in project.pbxproj
[Fix]: Update Github Actions

name: Release v0.17.2
body:
- [Fix]: Fixed incorrect audio bitrate sanitization #473
- [Fix]: Fix audio crash on teardown #495

name: Release v0.17.1
body:
# 0.17.1 (May 25, 2021)

- **[Fix]**: Fixed @opentok/types (merged from [PR505](https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/pull/505))
- **[Fix]**: Fixed double listeners [#271](https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/271) (merged from [PR307](https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/pull/307))

name: Release v0.17.0
body:
- New feature: Updated to react-native 0.64.0
- Fix: Updated npm dependencies
- Fix: Fixed react-native 0.64.0 `nativeEvents.listeners()` crash [PR493](https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/pull/493)

name: Release v0.16.0
body: - New feature: Added support for `stereo` output on `iOS` and `Android` using `CustomAudioDevice`.

name: Release v0.15.0
body:
- New feature: Added preferredResolution and preferredFrameRate properties on OTSubscriber.
- Fix bugs
- iOS SDK updated to `2.18.1`
- Android SDK updated to `2.18.1`
- Added typescript support

name: v0.14.0
body:
- Update of iOS SDK to `2.17.0` and Android SDK to `2.17.1`
- OTSessionManager.java#248 mSubscriber.destroy() removed as from 2.17.x, resources will be automatically released by the garbage collector.

name: Release v0.13.0
body:
- Adds support for session options when mounting `OTSession`
- Upgrades the native SDKs to use Android 2.16.5 and iOS 2.16.5

Thank you @enricop89 for the contributions!

name: Release v0.12.2
body:
-   **[Fix]**: Prevent to unpublish on disconnected sessions (merged from [PR356](https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/pull/356)). Adheres to: [#337](https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/337)
-   **[Feature]**: Add podspec for autolinking support in RN 0.6x (merged from [PR358](https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/pull/358)). Adheres to: [#332](https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/332)
-   Android SDK updated to `2.16.3`

name: Release v0.12.1
body:
[Fix]: Fix an error when updating streamId for subscriber component (merged from PR326). Adheres to: #315, #324
[Fix]: Use Context API for passing props down the component tree (merged from PR333). Adheres to: #329, #335
[Fix]: Fix Attempted to register RCTBridgeModule class OTSessionManager issue after opening/reloading app (merged from PR336).
[Fix]: Fix reload in iOS (merged from PR339).
[Fix]: Fix security vulnerabilities on dependencies (merged from PR339).

name: Release v0.12.0
body: - Add support to multiple sessions

name: Release v0.11.1
body:
- Documentation corrections for `subscribeToSelf` 
- Added documentation for `videoType` property in a `stream` event object

name: Release v0.11.0
body:
- Fixes axios vulnerability
- Adds ability to subscribe to self via a prop
- Adds videoType to RN stream map

name: Release v0.10.3
body:
- Fixes: https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/284
- Fixes: https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/269

name: Release v0.10.2
body:
- Fixes #235 & #155 - Thanks @xxsnakerxx !!
 - Updates native SDKs to use 2.16.0
 - Updates ReadME

name: Release v0.10.1
body: - Fixes signaling issue that was introduced in v0.10.0

name: Release v0.10.0
body:
Adds an `otrnError` event for `OTSession`, `OTPublisher`, and `OTSubscriber` components: https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/254

Adds an `options` prop for `OTSession` so you can specify things like `textureViews`, `zIndex` options, and more: https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/162 (Thanks @ggoldens !!)

Adds signaling to specific connections: https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/195

name: Release v0.9.8
body:
- Fixes: https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/227
- Removes hardcoding of publisher view on top on Android

name: Release v0.9.7
body: Fixes Android crashes: https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/pull/243 - Thanks @pedro-cerdera!

name: Release v0.9.6
body:
- Compiles for Swift 4.2
Fixes #233 - Thanks @mbouxin!
Fixes #197  - Thanks @ggoldens, @tarunmehta-quovantis, and @TeruyaHaroldo!!
Fixes #229
Fixes #230

name: Release v0.9.5
body:
- Updates native SDKs to 2.15.3
- Fixes https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/220 (Thanks @ArtemSerga!)

name: Release v0.9.4
body:
- Fixes #175 
- Fixes #115 
- Fixes #202

name: v0.9.3
body:
- Expose token data via connection object for stream events (#209)

Please note that the `connetionId` property of the `stream` event will be removed with `v0.11.0` because it is a part of the `connection` object.

name: Release v0.9.2
body:
- Update to use 2.15.2 SDKs
  - Fixes #190 
- Adds documentation for `streamPropertyChangedEvent` #194

name: Release v0.9.1
body:
- Update to use 2.15.1 SDKs to fix signaling issue #192 
- Fix warnings for Android gradle files

name: Release v0.9.0
body:
- Changes target on iOS 
- Fixes typos on README
- Adds documentation for error object and other event objects
- Updates the OpenTok iOS and Android SDK to `2.15.0`
- Refactors and cleans up iOS and Android code
- Creates an API to enable logs for the native layer by calling `OT.enableLogs(true)` // default is false
- Adds support for the `reconnected` event for `OTSubscriber`
- All `OTSubscriber` events are dispatched with a `stream` object to be able to differentiate between subscribers.

name: Release v0.8.4
body:
- Fixes https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/128 - Thanks @mbouxin!
- Fixes https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/145 - Thanks @sunweiyang
- Fixes https://github.com/opentok/opentok-react-native/issues/122

name: v0.8.3
body: Fixes #142 (Android)

name: v0.8.2
body:
Fixes `streamPropertyChanged` crash on Android (#130) Thanks @mbouxin!!
Fixes `hasAudio` and `hasVideo` stream name on Android (#129) Thanks @mbouxin!!

name: v0.8.1
body:
Fixes #94 for iOS. Thanks @dtaborda 
Adds GH templates to issues and PRs

name: v0.8.0
body:
* Adds the `streamProperties` prop to `OTSubscriber` so you can modify properties for individual streams (#100)
* Adds support for `streamPropertyChanged` event (#112)
* Fixes `videoDisabled` event for iOS (#111) -- Thanks @MaFranceschi!
* Updates README with archive instructions for iOS

name: v0.7.1
body: Fix README installation typo

name: v0.7.0
body:
#16 Improves iOS installation
#87 Fixes iOS warnings 
#96 Fixes creation time issue on iOS

name: v0.6.5
body:
Fixes race condition where conditional publishing was failing
Fixes #85 - unmounting Android crash for both `OTPublisher` and `OTSubscriber`

name: v0.6.4
body: Fixes #89

name: v0.6.3
body:
Fixes iOS issue for publisher events: #78 
Adds sample information to the README file
Fixes a bug where the app was crashing if no credentials were provided to the `OTSession` component.

name: v0.6.2
body:
Fixes Android exception
Adds OTScreenCapturer.swift to README file
Fixes SEO issue with OpenTok Labs Banner

name: v0.6.1
body: Fix iOS Swift compile issue

name: v0.6.0
body:
Adds support for multiple publishers
Adds screen sharing
Adds docs about all supported events
Fixes bugs where session and subscriber events were still being dispatched even after the components had unmounted
Fixes iOS live reload issue

name: v0.5.2
body: Updates native SDKs to 2.14.0

name: v0.5.2
body:
Fix videoNetworkStats event for iOS 
Improve internal logging

name: v0.5.1
body: Fixes `subscribeToVideo` issue on Android

name: v0.5.0
body:
* Added Camera & Microphone permissions info under iOS and Android installation
* Added the ability to change the camera position after the `OTPublisher` component was initialized

name: v0.4.1
body:
Improve README to explain OTPublisher unmounting and fix camera resolution typo
Fix unpublish bug
Fix OTPublisher handleError method
Fix iOS Bridging Header to include OpenTok
